flawed_nl_solution:
He finished high school in 4-1=<<4-1=3>>3 years
It takes him 3*3=<<3*3=9>>9 years to finish tertiary education
So he spends 3+9=<<3+9=21>>21 years on this education
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
